# widget_message struct

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/ui/widget_message
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T07:08:45.983983

---

Parameters for `event`s signalled by a `widget`.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/UI }` |

## Members

This struct has data members, but no functions.

### Data

| Data Member Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `Player` | `player` | The `player` that triggered the `event`. |
| `Source` | `widget` | The `widget` that triggered the `event`. |
